name: Nan Munireachh Vityea
content:
Welcome to Vityea's news!
Right now, this is all I can say.
Stay tuned for more updates!

name: Nan Munireachh Vityea
content:
Yo! I'm currently in Vietnam for a short trip.
I'll be back on Saturday, 6th September 2025.
If you need to call to me, here's my Vietnamese number: +84 92 3412 346.

name: Nan Munireachh Vityea
content:
Hiya! I'm departing back to Cambodia today.
I'll be back around 6 or 7 PM Cambodian Time.
If y'all need some APIs to build, hit me up!
editContent:
Edit: I added a Settings page to toggle Dark Mode and Light Mode.
Check it out!

name: Nan Munireachh Vityea
content:
Hello There!
It's a me! Vityea (Bruh)
Unlike any type of news today.
This is a limited-time event.
It's actually getting a free email forwarder with the vityea.us.kg domain.
You can submit here: https://forms.vityea.us.kg
A random winner will be selected.
Signed: Vityea.

name: Vityea Website Mitigations Officer
content:
Hello clients!
Incase you didn't know we're doing a limited time email forwarding for free with the domain of vityea.us.kg
For no reason at all, Cloudflare is having issues with their APIs. As such, the domain forms.vityea.us.kg
See attachment below:

We apologize for not being able to serve the Google Forms to submit as this is beyond our control.

Issued announcement from: Vityea Website Mitigations Officer.
editContent:
Nan Munireachh Vityea Edit: Someone accidentally pushed/commited the JSON of "edit" false without the parameter of : causing the news to not load.
Please read before commiting!
Vityea Edit 2: Added class="black" to URL and resized image to 20px for both width and height
Vityea Edit 3: I also accidentally pushed/commited without "\" my mistake.
Vityea Edit 4: I added Link on image since it's too small to view.

name: Vityea Website Mitigations Officer
content:
Hello clients!
The issue regarding forms.vityea.us.kg not redirecting.
The issue was promptly resolved.

Issued announcement from: Vityea Website Mitigations Officer.
